history.narrative: Law 5-86, the “Health-Care Assistance Reimbursement Act of 1984,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-271, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 27, 1984, and April 10, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 26, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-124 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
